name: Agent of C.O.V.E.R.
description:
You are an agent of C.O.V.E.R. tasked with the mission of retrieving a weapon from an enemy camp. Play as the agent in this third-person game and complete the mission equipped with enough firepower to take the enemy down.

This game was originally made for TV Gamejam 2019, but was never submitted as I missed the deadline by a few minutes. Added music and some more environment assets afterwards. (approx. 10 min of gameplay)
